project_plan.name: Weather Information Fetcher in Python
project_plan.description: Build a Python program that fetches the current weather information for a given city using a public API and displays the temperature, humidity, and weather conditions in the terminal.

task.name: Research and select a suitable public weather API
Implement functionality to fetch weather data for a given city
Parse the retrieved data to extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
Implement functionality to display the weather information in the terminal
Write tests to ensure the functionality works correctly
Execute tests on the program to verify that the implementation is functioning as expected
